Author: Moderator
Message: Hello JonasBleats!

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study!

Author: JonasBleats
Message: No problem!

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: When I say stop, it needs to be in the brackets, correct?

Author: Moderator
Message: As long as it's explicit enough it's good.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Okay, then I'm good.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Hey, how is it going?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright! How about you?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: I'm doing fairly good, just relaxing before work tomorrow. Trying my best to take it easy. What are you up to?

Author: Andrew
Message: Relaxing a bit before going to bed. Watching random youtube videos until I'm too tired to keep watching them.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Oh neat, what video has your current attention?

Author: Andrew
Message: Right now it's a minecraft youtuber. He's building a beautiful castle.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: That's pretty cool. Why do you think it's beautiful, though?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's very detailed and feels quite realistic. He's also using angles in an interesting way.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Huh, I guess I wouldn't ever think of something from Minecraft as being realistic. I've never been a big fan of the game myself.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, he uses a modded version of it, so that might be why. I'm a big fan of the game myself.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: What is your favorite feature of the game?

Author: Andrew
Message: Just the fact that you can do almost anything if you've got some imagination.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Do you have magic in the game at all?

Author: Andrew
Message: To some extent yes. But by default not a lot for your player. You might have to fight magical enemies though.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: I prefer high fantasy games myself, I like shooting lightning bolts.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, it turns out you can modify the game enough to do just that. I play on a server which has spells as a part of its battle system.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: That's pretty cool. My favorite game at the moment just happens to be the Witcher and Dark Souls.

Author: Andrew
Message: I've never played any of those, but I've heard good things about both, and I've also watched others play them.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Any reason you haven't tried them out?

Author: Andrew
Message: Lack of interest for Dark Souls, and lack of funds for the Witcher. It annoys me how slow the dialogs are in Dark Souls for example.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Yeah, but there is less dialogue in Dark Souls than in the Witcher, and it's less essential to actually enjoying the game.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: I think it was the AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright, we'll begin the next conversation. Andrew will start, then you'll have 15 minutes again after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Hey there! How is your night going?

Author: Andrew
Message: What about yours? It's quite alright so far.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Mine has been kinda boring. Been playing Minecraft.

Author: Andrew
Message: It's actually one of my favorite games! Oh that's a shame, what are you doing in it?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Trying to figure out what I need to build a portal.

Author: Andrew
Message: Just obsidian and a flint and steel.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: What is the flint and steel for?

Author: Andrew
Message: You just click on the obsidian with it to activate the portal.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Got it. So what do you tend to do in Minecraft.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm a rather good builder. I mostly just spend my time building.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: Are there any other games you enjoy?

Author: Andrew
Message: I also like Dragon Age, and I finished the last Mass Effect recently. Yeah.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: What do you like about those games?

Author: Andrew
Message: Do you like those too? How your choices matter, and mostly the stories.

Author: JonasBleats
Message: I'm not a huge fan of Mass Effect. Dragon Age is okay. I'm more of a Dark Souls and Witcher player myself.

Author: Andrew
Message: Witcher has a very good story for what I've heard. Dark Souls isn't really my kind of game. I heard good things about both.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: First conversation was an AI I think.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain) how confident are you of your answer?

Author: JonasBleats
Message: I'd say a 4.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now, otherwise, you can now close this window.
